title: Can I change the DOB in 10th and 12th marksheet? I passed 10th in the year 2009 and 12th in 2011. I have a birth certificate as proof. - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes you can by filing a suit in the civil court praying for the passing of an order directing the relevant board of education to make the relevant change. The court shall pass the appropriate order in case it is satisfied that your birth certificate is authentic proof of the correctness of the date of your birth. For this please go through my previous answers on this issue.
